General.Name: Malton Bhd
General.Description: Malton Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the investment, development, construction, and sale of properties in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development, Construction Contracts, Property Trading, and Others segments. Its property developments include townships, luxury homes, landed and high-rise residences, offices, and commercial properties in the areas of Greater Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Malacca, and Johor. The company also provides construction and project management services. In addition, it is involved in the property investment and management, and provision of management and accounting services; and construction works for and sales of developed residential and commercial properties. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
